meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7631.

td.p: Lilly Chin, a robotics Ph.D. student at MIT from Decatur, Georgia
Austin Rogers, a bartender from New York, New York
Andrew Pau, an associate professor from Amherst, Ohio

tr.td: GET AN EDUCATION
STARTS WITH A DOUBLE VOWEL
OHIO
QUEEN-SIZED
MUSIC FOR CHAMPS
LIGHT UP A CIGAR
